::Grounded/Lynxiz::
Grounded looked to Trinity then Nightlight. She knew how to deal with
the young bot.
"Come on Trin...i need some major help up here.

Lynxiz looked to Nightlight then looked to thier enemy's.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Trinity:::
>
> "I'm not a guard... "whined Trinity "I'm a warrior... I have to
> protect my base "
>
> Nighlight appeared and hugged the little bot "but Trinity it's an
> important job, young-one, YOu and grounded will have the mission to
> Protect the base if some of those means bots come in, who will stop
> them???"
>
> "ME, ME MEEEEEEE" replied Trinity and after Nightlight hugged her,
> the shild-bot ran where Grounder was.
>
> "Let's go, Lynzix" said Nighlight and left the ship
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Grounded/Lynxiz::
> > In an instant Grounded disabled Trinity's code not allowing her to
> > walk through the field.
> > "I'm sorry Trin...can yu come watch the moniters for me."
> >
> > Lynxiz ran out following Nightlight.
> > "Sorry but you took me in....I shall fight for you...for now." she
> > replied running out but getting stopped by the shiled for not
> having a
> > code. Grounded noticed this and opend the shields for a split
> second.
> > "Get out" the small mole spit out and Lynxiz ran out not waiting the
> > shileds closing behind her.
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > Trinity/Termitron/Nightlight/Windlord
> > >
> > > Windlord go out an fired two missiles against Banzai-bot.
> Nighlight
> > > opened her comm link as soon as she knew that the base was
> attacked
> > > and said to Grounded "Grounded don't let TRinity go out" and
> looking
> > > to Lynzix she said "I have to fight... I can't beg you that jojn
> this
> > > battle and I suggest you that stay here"
> > >
> > > She ran towards the exit. TErmitron left the ship and fired 25
> times
> > > against Deemos.
> > >
> > > Trinity shouted "No body will hurt my friends!!!!!" and ran
> towards
> > > the exit
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > >
